quote: Spinoza Experience keeps a dear school, but fools will learn in no other.
The person who writes for fools is always sure of a large audience.
Wise men learn more from fools than fools from the wise.
Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain - and most fools do.
Although the masters make the rules for the wise men and the fools got nothing, Ma, to live up to.
Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools.
Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain - and most fools do.
At Athens, wise men propose, and fools dispose.
At their first appearance innovators have always been derided as fools and mad men.
Bad experience is a school that only fools keep going to.
Bigotry murders religion to frighten fools with her ghost.
But their determination to banish fools foundered ultimately in the installation of absolute idiots.
Spinoza Experience keeps a dear school, but fools will learn in no other.
The person who writes for fools is always sure of a large audience.
Wise men learn more from fools than fools from the wise.
Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain - and most fools do.
Although the masters make the rules for the wise men and the fools got nothing, Ma, to live up to.
Anger dwells only in the bosom of fools.
Any fool can criticize, condemn, and complain - and most fools do.
At Athens, wise men propose, and fools dispose.
At their first appearance innovators have always been derided as fools and mad men.
Bad experience is a school that only fools keep going to.
Bigotry murders religion to frighten fools with her ghost.
But their determination to banish fools foundered ultimately in the installation of absolute idiots.
Change of weather is the discourse of fools.
Despair is the conclusion of fools.
Drinking makes such fools of people, and people are such fools to begin with, that it's compounding a felony.
Even the wisest men make fools of themselves about women, and even the most foolish women are wise about men.
Experience keeps a school, yet fools will learn in no other.
Foolproof systems do not take into account the ingenuity of fools.
Fools act on imagination without knowledge, pedants act on knowledge without imagination.
Fools admire, but men of sense approve.
Fools are my theme, let satire be my song.
Fools are without number.
Fools make researches and wise men exploit them.
Fools may our scorn, not envy, raise. For envy is a kind of praise.
Fools rush in where angels fear to thread.
Fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
Fools take to themselves the respect that is given to their office.
For fools rush in where angels fear to tread.
For Forms of Government let fools contest; whatever is best administered is best.
Fortune can, for her pleasure, fools advance,
Fortune, seeing that she could not make fools wise, has made them lucky.
Get the fools on your side and you can be elected to anything.
Greatest fools are the most often satisfied.
How many fools does it take to make up a public?
I have great faith in fools; My friends call it self-confidence.
I love fools experiments. I am always making them.
I'll publish right or wrong. Fools are my theme, let satire be my song.
If it were not for the company of fools, a witty man would often be greatly at a loss.
Impossible is a word only to be found in the dictionary of fools.
Impossible is a word to be found only in the dictionary of fools.
In university they don't tell you that the greater part of the law is learning to tolerate fools.
Is pride, the never-failing vice of fools.
It is hard to free fools from the chains they revere.
It seems to never occur to fools that merit and good fortune are closely united.
Let us be thankful for the fools. But for them the rest of us could not succeed.
Logical consequences are the scarecrows of fools and the beacons of wise men.
Lord, what fools these mortals be.
Lovers are fools, but Nature makes them so.
Men who know themselves are no longer fools. They stand on the threshold of the door of Wisdom.
Most fools think they are only ignorant.
Nature makes only dumb animals. We owe the fools to society.
No man is esteemed for colorful garments except by fools and women.
Nothing fools people as much as extreme passion.
People are born fools and damned for not being wiser.
Politics will sooner or later make fools of everybody.
Power does not corrupt men; fools, however, if they get into a position of power, corrupt power.
Prejudices are what fools use for reason.
Seek but provision of bread and wine, fools to flatter, and clothing fine; and nothing of God shall ever be thine.
Silence is the virtue of fools.
Silence is the wit of fools.
Take all the fools out of this world and there wouldn't be any fun living in it, or profit.
The company of fools may first make us smile, but in the end we always feel melancholy.
The greatest lesson in life is to know that even fools are right sometimes.
The multitude of fools is a protection to the wise.
The surprising thing about young fools is how many survive to become old fools.
The ultimate result of shielding men from the effects of folly, is to fill the world with fools.
The wise have always said the same things, and fools, who are the majority have always done just the opposite.
The wise make proverbs, and fools repeat them.
There are more fools than knaves in the world, else the knaves would not have enough to live upon.
There are two kinds of fools: those who can't change their opinions and those who won t.
There are two kinds of fools: those who can't change their opinions and those who won't.
There are well-dressed foolish ideas, just as there are will-dressed fools.
To suckle fools, and chronicle small beer.
Tomorrow is only found in the calendar of fools.
Touch not the flute when drums are sounding around; when fools have the word, the wise will be silent.
Tricks and treachery are the practice of fools, that don't have brains enough to be honest.
Truth from his lips prevailed with double sway, and fools, who came to scoff, remained to pray.
We are all fools in love.
We must learn to live together as brothers or perish together as fools.
We think our fathers fools, so wise we grow. Our wiser sons, no doubt will think us so.
When we are born we cry that we are come.. to this great stage of fools.
While fools shun one set of faults they run into the opposite one.
Wise men argue cases, fools decide them.
Wise men don't need advice. Fools won't take it.
Wise men talk because they have something to say; fools, because they have to say something.
Words are the money of fools.
Words are the money of fools.
Words are wise men's counters, they do but reckon by them: but they are the money of fools.
You know the expression 'God protects fools and drunks'? I qualify for both.
Zeal is fit for wise men, but flourishes chiefly among fools.
